entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
